reviewText: Some of the most inspirational, fervent and passionate singing you will ever here!  The singing by all the groups were of good variety and especially enjoyed the "I believe in a Hill called Mount Calvary" by the Hoppers.  Their tight harmony was bone chilling inspirational!

Bill and Gloria Gaither have produced a treasure of DVD and CD recordings in the "Homecoming" Series, and they have all been very good; but the "Tent Revival Homecoming" is one of their best productions to date. Recorded at the Billy Graham Library, it brings together many of the Gospel music artists seen and heard on previous "Homecoming" productions, as well as iconic Billy Graham associates George Beverly Shea and Cliff Barrows. If you love Gospel music, you'll be totally pleased with this DVD, and you'll enjoy the "Tent Revival Homecoming" CD also.
The Tent Revival Homecoming DVD is great and I have enjoyed viewing it several times.  Bill & Gloria Gather are producing quality DVD's and CD's.  They fill your heart and soul with joy.
This is another very good Homecoming DVD from Gaithers.  Product arrived timely and as advertised.  I would order from this store through Amazon again.
All the Gaither albums are fantastic. I am slowly acquiring as many as possible. I also get the Gaither music on cable.

This is an enjoyable DVD, and a good addition to my collection. However, it is not as enjoyable to me as some. I do have The Old Rugged Cross, which, I believe, was done at the same time, and I think I like it better, but I would not want to lose either of them.

I realize that this is not much of a review, but there was nothing sufficiently specific that I can mention. Mostly, this DVD received five stars, so someone disagrees with me.  I think that the Gaither's do a good job of giving us variety, and I do have a couple of their other DVDs I seldom play. Yet, considering that I have about 64, this is not bad, huh?

I ordered this in February to take to our summer home in VT.  .We bought a RCA Portable DVD player yesterday, and it would not play.  I all of a sudden noticed  there was a crack on the inner part of the DVD which was almost impossible to see at a quick look..  I am so disappointed and will never buy anything from the Gaither's again.  We have never had this problem with amazon in the past, and I am partially to blame for not playing it sooner.

Every now and then, Gaither Homecoming has some remarkable double programs. And this unique concert was recorded at the Billy Graham Library, in North Carolina. You will get a tour. Surprisingly, two elderly guests who performed with Graham are here, Cliff Barrows 89, music and program director for the Graham organization, and America's beloved gospel singer, 104-year old George Beverly Shea. It is great to see some of the old timers included in the 140 of gospel singers, namely Ben Speer. This wonderful program recaptures the spirit and fun of the old fashioned tent revival gospel music. The performers have replicated the dress of the 50's and 60's, complete with the huge tent and sawdust on the floor. To start the program, one of the first songs of the Gaithers that introduced me to the Homecoming Friends...and that is "Yes, I Know", a long-time favorite. I love the upbeat "Jesus Hold My Hand" and one I had not heard before, "Down to the River". Enjoy the classic "When the Saints Go Marching In". There is a person, new to me, and her name is Taranda Green. If you enjoyed her singing, she does have a strong presence here thoughout. Country music favorites, the Gatlin Brothers, The Gatlin Brothers Come Home Gaither Gospel Series and more regulars returned, The Hoppers, The Isaacs, Gaither Vocal Band, The Easters, etc. "Daddy Sang Bass" was sung by Dailey & Vincent, who performed on another of the best concert doubles, Bill Gaither Presents: A Gospel Bluegrass Homecoming, Volume 1 and Gospel Bluegrass Homecoming, Vol. 2. It is not often that we get to hear Michael Sykes sing. Sykes is married to Tanya Goodman. Do yourself a favor and own the partner to this Tent Revival, Bill & Gloria Gaither: The Old Rugged Cross ..... Rizzo
This DVD was a typical Bill & Gloria Gaither and had many singers and beautiful old songs that I enjoy listening to.

I HAVE LISTENED TO, AND COLLECTED GAITHER MUSIC FOR SEVERAL YEARS.
THEIR MUSIC IS DOWN-HOME; THE PERFORMERS ARE SINCERE; A TRULY UPLIFTING SPIRIT IS EVIDENT IN THE SINGING, AND EVEN THE HUMOR IS ACCEPTABLE.
THE LOVE OF GOD AND ALL THINGS CHRISTIAN CAN BE FOUND EACH TIME I LISTEN TO THE MUSIC OR WATCH THE VIDEOS.

This was Bill & Gloria Gaither's best.  So entertaining and heartfelt.  These people are so talented.  Good clean talent of the best kind.  I can't seem to watch it enough.  Thanks to the Gaither family, all of them.
one of the best that i have seen without all of the orignal singers.you realize how long they have been doing the homecoming series.

seldom have i had as blessed a spirit filled time as with gaither hyms & products. having met irv chambers at a school assembly in moncton n.b. in the 60s it was great re-experiencing his genius. also g.b. shea. seeing singing women of high moral code of honour,no matter the cost performing brought tears to my eyes. i have walked with the Lord for 60  of my 64 years. this was good for eye washing & soul edefication as all gaither products are bathed in the "power of the blood". don't hear much reference to this anymore, but i remember the old saw dust trail & the God who reaches the lost sheep, regardless of politics.

The projects based on a time period interest me. Mostly because a lot of these songs were being sung in my youth. I always head to Amazon when something good comes along. The quartet and trio harmony I find especially inspiring. This is not just a rehash of pieces from various concerts, but all about the old tent meetings. Oh the memories.

I have dozens of the Gaither albums.  "Tent Revival" does not disappoint.  If you are a follower of the classic music of the Billy Graham crusades and Bill & Gloria Gather homecomings, you will enjoy this album.  Centurion George Beverly Shay still has that beautiful and inspirational voice.
This is a great present for any devout Christian.  The person that I bought this for loved the DVD and can't stop watching it.
great video,awesome songs,loved it,cant wait for the next video out.the cast of singers,chosen and put together was the right choice.touched my heart
